name: Engine
des: The engine is the heart of your car. It is a complex machine built to convert heat from burning gas into the force that turns the road wheels

name: Alternator
des: Keep the electric current steady: Not only does your battery provide the energy required to start your car, but it’s also stabilizing the voltage in order to keep your engine running.

name: Radiator
des: The fuel supplied to the combustion chamber must be ignited to deliver power. In a spark-ignition engine, an electric spark is used for this purpose. The compression-ignition engine does not require a separate ignition system because the ignition is affected

name: Front Axle
des: The function of a lubricant is to act as a coolant and also as a sealing medium to prevent leakages. Finally, a film of lubricant on the cylinder walls helps the rings in sealing and thus improves the engine’s compressions

name: Brakes
des: The Break system is used for changing the direction of the vehicle. The major requirements in any steering mechanism are that it should be precise and easy to handle.

name: Front Steering and Suspension
des: A transmission changes gears depending on car speed and accelerator input  so that the engine’s RPM or “revolutions per minute” are kept appropriately low.
